Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality item that could potentially save you thousands over its retail value. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
